sentences.sentence: Mr Gong says the drafters have added provisions on the protection of state property.
sentences.translation: 巩献田说，法案起草者已经加入了保护国有财产的条款。

sentences.sentence: May direct or coordinate work of drafters, technicians and other non - exempt personnel.
sentences.translation: 指导或协调绘图员、技术员和其他人员的工作。

sentences.sentence: Their drafters always strive to achieve preciseness in all levels of the English Language.
sentences.translation: 工程合同英语的一切特征都是为了达到严谨性的要求。
